title: Baby Archie already has best friends and they’re not who you think!
text:
Baby Archie already has best friends and they’re not who you think!

Cape Town - Baby Archie has wasted no time in making friends!

The five-month-old tot has reportedly formed a special bond with two of his mom’s stylists, Express UK reports.

James Benoit, hairdresser to Meghan, Duchess of Sussex, has struck up a cute friendship with Archie, according to the NY Times Post.

James works alongside celebrity stylist George Northwood, who was chosen by Meghan to style her hair for her wedding reception and has also formed a close bond with the tot.

The duo recently got to spend quality time with little Archie when they accompanied Meghan and her husband, Prince Harry, on their tour of southern Africa.

On day three of their trip, Archie made his first public appearance when he met Archbishop Desmond Tutu.

Meghan described her son as "an old soul" while Harry says he’s already a natural behind the camera.

"I think he’s used to it already," the Duke of Sussex said.

Meanwhile, stylists James and George are probably going to continue to play a role in Archie’s life after royal expert, Angela Mollard revealed Harry wants to keep his inner-circle tight and give Archie a private life.

(Sources: Express UK, NY Times Post)
